mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenant_info ( tenant_code, tenant_name, status, max_chains, max_components, executor_cached, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{tenantCode}, #{tenantName}, #{status}, #{maxChains}, #{maxComponents}, #{executorCached}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tenant_info SET tenant_name = #{tenantName}, status = #{status}, max_chains = #{maxChains}, max_components = #{maxComponents}, executor_cached = #{executorCached}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tenant_info WHERE tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND deleted_at IS NULL LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM tenant_info WHERE deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tenant_info WHERE tenant_code = #{tenantCode} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE tenant_info SET deleted_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW(), status = 'DELETED' WHERE id = #{id}
